memberdef.argsstring:
(".globl sysFork 
""sysFork: 
"" xor %eax,%eax 
"" call schedNewTask 
"" testl %eax,%eax 
"" je fork_ret 
"" pushl %esi 
"" pushl %edi 
"" pushl %ebp 
"" pushl %eax 
"" call fork_copyProcess 
"" movl %eax,(%ebx) 
"" addl $16,%esp 
""fork_ret: 
"" ret 
")
memberdef.name: asm

memberdef.argsstring: (struct taskStruct *newProcess, long ebp, long edi, long esi, long none, long ebx, long ecx, long edx, long eip, long cs, long eflags, long esp, long ss)
memberdef.name: fork_copyProcess
